result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Voucher to DOA for Polk County Treasurer to pay $122.50 interpreter fees.
Notice of Hearing to Defendant - Preliminary Hearing - Return to Sender, Not Deliverable as Addressed, Unable to Forward.

Attorney James H. Krave in court. KJB- Clerk. 4:14pm Def does not appear. ADA does not appear- but ADA and COunsel were together yesterday and agreed to issue warrant if Def didn't appear by today. CT issues warrant. 4:15pm adj.

Attorney James H. Krave in court.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Luis Daniel Torres not in court. JP-Clerk.  11:38   Set for PH at 11:30, file reflects on 11-20-14 Notice was generated, but not noted how it was sent.  No RUMS.  ADA requests warrant.  Ct orders warrant stayed until 3:00 p.m. 12-19-14.  11:42 adj.
Voucher for Polk Co Treasurer to pay interpretor fees for 5 cases.
Preliminary hearing on December 18, 2014 at 11:30 am.

Defendant Luis Daniel Torres in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Defendant Luis Daniel Torres in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KK Clerk 9:41AM Susan Schweigert appears by phone as interp.  Atty Firkus addresses bond situtation.  Def states that should be able to post bond either today or tomorrow.  Warrant out of Dunn county.  Court - Will need to be transported Dunn county on warrant - once bond is posted in polk county.  adj.  9:46AM
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint
Adjourned initial appearance on November 17, 2014 at 02:00 pm.
10% CASH to get out of jail: must pay $500 to get out of jail.   Not to possess or consume alcohol- absolute sobriety.   Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.

Defendant Luis Daniel Torres in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Defendant Luis Daniel Torres in custody.  Interpreter Maria Marin on phone. Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin. KJB- Clerk. 1:25pm 1:27 CT takes break.  1:39pm back on record. Def does not qualify. CC is a 2 count CC. CT- also Dunn Cty warrant. PD's office will try to get atty to cover both counties. bond cont. 1:52  pm adj.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 17, 2014 at 02:00 pm.
